title: These 5 states have less than 10% of ICU beds left as Covid-19 overwhelms hospitals
content:
1. These 5 states have less than 10% of ICU beds left as Covid-19 overwhelms hospitals  CNN
  2. Ventilators' use rises in virus cases  Arkansas Online
  3. COVID-19 in Oklahoma: Latest hospital capacity figures from Integris Health, Mercy, OU Health and SSM Health  Oklahoman.com
  4. Data from OKC's major hospitals paints dire picture of COVID-19 hospitalizations  KOCO Oklahoma City
  5. Why Rising COVID-19 Hospitalizations Are a Risk to Everyone's Health  Healthline
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
These 5 states have less than 10% of ICU beds left as Covid-19 overwhelms hospitals  CNN
Ventilators' use rises in virus cases  Arkansas Online
COVID-19 in Oklahoma: Latest hospital capacity figures from Integris Health, Mercy, OU Health and SSM Health  Oklahoman.com
Data from OKC's major hospitals paints dire picture of COVID-19 hospitalizations  KOCO Oklahoma City

localize.title: これらの5つの州では、Covid-19が病院を圧迫しているため、ICUのベッド数が10％以下になっている。
由于Covid-19使医院不堪重负，这5个州的ICU床位仅剩不到10%。
由於Covid-19使醫院不堪重負，這5個州的ICU牀位僅剩不到10%。
